keyMoments.title: Tom's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Tom, the legendary fish-man shipwright, is introduced finding young Franky on Scrap Island and taking him in as an apprentice alongside Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Tom is revealed as the builder of Gold Roger's ship and becomes a father figure to Franky, teaching him the philosophy that a shipwright must take pride in their creations.
keyMoments.quote: A shipwright must always be proud of the ships they create, no matter what they're used for!

keyMoments.title: Tom's Trial for Building the Oro Jackson
keyMoments.description: Tom is sentenced to death for building Gold Roger's ship but proudly declares he has no regrets about his work.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Tom's unwavering principles and sets up the conflict with the World Government that will define his story.
keyMoments.quote: I am proud to have built the ship that carried the Pirate King! I have no regrets!

keyMoments.title: Tom Proposes the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Facing execution, Tom proposes building a revolutionary Sea Train to save Water 7 in exchange for a pardon.
keyMoments.significance: This decision leads to Tom's greatest achievement and will save Water 7 from economic collapse.
keyMoments.quote: Give me ten years! I'll build a train that runs on the sea and save this island!

keyMoments.title: Successful Maiden Voyage of the Puffing Tom
keyMoments.description: After ten years of construction, Tom successfully completes the Sea Train's first voyage, bringing hope to Water 7.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of Tom's dream and proof of his genius as a shipwright.

statusHistory.reason: Active in flashback during Water 7 arc

abilities.description: Tom is renowned as the most talented shipwright in the world, capable of building legendary ships like the Oro Jackson and the Sea Train.

relationships.description: Tom found young Franky abandoned on Scrap Island and took him in as an apprentice, becoming a father figure and teaching him shipbuilding.

evolutionMoments.description: Tom finds 10-year-old Cutty Flam on Scrap Island and takes him as his apprentice.

relationships.description: Tom trained Iceburg as his apprentice alongside Franky, teaching both boys the art of shipbuilding.

evolutionMoments.description: Tom works with both Iceburg and Franky as his apprentices on the Sea Train project.

relationships.description: Kokoro worked with Tom's Workers and assisted with the Sea Train project.

reveals.information: Tom built the Oro Jackson, the ship of the Pirate King Gol D. Roger
Tom was sentenced to death for building Roger's ship but proposed building the Sea Train in exchange for a pardon
Tom is a fish-man (longhorn cowfish type) and the world's greatest shipwright

keyMoments.title: Jorge Presides Over Tom's Trial
keyMoments.description: Judge Jorge sentences Tom to death for building Gold Roger's ship, but offers him a chance at pardon if he can build the Sea Train in ten years.
keyMoments.significance: Jorge's decision to accept Tom's proposal allows the Sea Train project to proceed, ultimately saving Water 7.

keyMoments.title: Jorge Returns to Water 7
keyMoments.description: After fourteen years, Jorge returns to Water 7, fascinated by the Sea Train's success and planning to pardon Tom permanently.
keyMoments.significance: Jorge's return represents the potential fulfillment of Tom's deal, though this hope will be tragically disrupted.

relationships.description: Jorge presided over Tom's trial and later became impressed by the Sea Train, showing himself to be a fair-minded judge.

evolutionMoments.description: Jorge sentences Tom to death but accepts his proposal to build the Sea Train.

reveals.information: Jorge is a World Government judge who presided over Tom's trial

keyMoments.title: CP9 Demands the Pluton Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Franky confronts CP9 as they reveal their true identities and demand he hand over the Pluton blueprints that were entrusted to him by Tom.
keyMoments.significance: This confrontation forces Franky to protect Tom's final legacy and the dangerous ancient weapon blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Franky's Origin Story Revealed
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows 10-year-old Cutty Flam arriving at Water 7 after being abandoned by his pirate parents, demonstrating his wild nature by firing cannonballs from his Battle Franky contraption.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Franky's tragic abandonment and how he came to be Tom's apprentice, explaining his fierce independence and mechanical genius.
keyMoments.quote: My parents ditched me. They were probably pirates who couldn't handle my behavior.

keyMoments.title: Franky and Iceburg's Apprenticeship
keyMoments.description: Young Franky works alongside Iceburg as Tom's apprentice, showing their brotherly bond despite contrasting personalities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the deep history and complicated relationship between Franky and Iceburg that persists in the present.

keyMoments.title: Helping Build the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Franky spends ten years helping Tom and Iceburg construct the revolutionary Sea Train, growing from a child into a young man during the project.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's growth as a shipwright under Tom's guidance and his contribution to one of the world's greatest achievements.

abilities.description: Even as a child, Franky built dangerous battle ships and weapons, demonstrating his early genius in mechanical engineering.

relationships.description: Tom became Franky's father figure and mentor, teaching him shipbuilding and the philosophy of taking pride in one's creations.

evolutionMoments.description: Tom finds abandoned Franky and takes him in as his apprentice.

relationships.description: Franky and Iceburg grew up together as Tom's apprentices, developing a brotherly yet competitive relationship.

evolutionMoments.description: Young Franky and Iceburg work together under Tom's guidance despite their clashing personalities.

reveals.information: Franky's real name is Cutty Flam and he was abandoned by his pirate parents at age 10
Franky was found by Tom on Scrap Island and became his apprentice
Franky helped build the Sea Train over a ten-year period
Franky possesses the Pluton blueprints that were entrusted to him by Tom through Iceburg

keyMoments.title: Young Iceburg as Tom's Apprentice
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows young Iceburg working as Tom's apprentice alongside Franky, displaying a more serious and responsible personality compared to Franky's wild nature.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Iceburg's history with Tom and Franky, explaining his current role as mayor of Water 7 and his connection to the Pluton blueprints.

keyMoments.title: Helping Build the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Iceburg dedicates ten years to helping Tom construct the Sea Train, growing from a boy into a young man during the project.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Iceburg's growth as a shipwright and his commitment to Tom's vision for saving Water 7.

abilities.description: Iceburg trained under Tom and became a skilled shipwright, later founding Galley-La Company.

relationships.description: Tom trained Iceburg as his apprentice, teaching him shipbuilding and eventually trusting him with the Pluton blueprints.

evolutionMoments.description: Iceburg works diligently as Tom's apprentice on the Sea Train project.

relationships.description: Iceburg and Franky grew up together as Tom's apprentices, often clashing but developing a deep brotherly bond.

evolutionMoments.description: Young Iceburg often argues with Franky about his dangerous Battle Franky projects.

reveals.information: Iceburg was Tom's apprentice alongside Franky and helped build the Sea Train

keyMoments.title: Kokoro with Tom's Workers
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows Kokoro as part of Tom's Workers family, assisting with the Sea Train project alongside Tom, Franky, and Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kokoro's long history with Tom's Workers and her role in the Sea Train's creation.

relationships.description: Kokoro worked with Tom's Workers and assisted with the Sea Train project.

reveals.information: Kokoro was part of Tom's Workers and helped with the Sea Train project

keyMoments.title: Yokozuna as Tom's Workers Pet
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows Yokozuna the giant frog as the mascot and pet of Tom's Workers, part of the family during the Sea Train's construction.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Yokozuna's bond with Tom and explains his later behavior of challenging the Sea Train.

relationships.description: Yokozuna was kept as a pet and friend by Tom's Workers.

reveals.information: Yokozuna was the pet and mascot of Tom's Workers during the Sea Train construction
